availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married Amanda Layne. Father of Minnie Layne, Mattie Layne, Clara Layne, and Henry Layne. Merchant in Christian County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Christian County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Unnamed District, p. 53; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District No. 2, p. 36; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Civil District 3, p. 27.
